title: 3Qs: Is the end near for daily fantasy sports? (Northeastern University)
text: ( Source : Northeastern University ) It's hard to miss the bom­bard­ment of adver­tise­ments touting daily fan­tasy sports web­sites such as Fan­ Duel and Boston-​​based DraftK­ings. One entity that has noticed the com­pa­nies' mete­oric rise
